txt.en: 'The Thunder-lord says we serve the Iron Crown now!'
'We will crush you little folk beneath our feet! The Thunder-lord commands it!'
'The Thunder-lord will take all the Trollshaws!'
The Giants' Table lies partially buried in snow
'The Thunder-lord says Angmar will pay us well for our strength!'
You should bring what news of the giants you uncover from journeying near the halls of the giants in the Misty Mountains.
The Giants' Table is no longer a place of peaceful negotiation
Treating with the giants may tell you about their motives
You find yourself journeying near the halls of the giants in the Misty Mountains. Nearby is the Giants' Table, a place of parley in elder days.
The Giants' Table is south of the pass of Rakh창s-bizar, east of the guarded pass of Gabilazan.
You found the Giants' Table, but the giants there attacked without warning. They have lost their respect for the old ways, and the Giants' Table is no longer a place of peaceful negotiation.
You found the Giants' Table, but the giants there attacked without warning. They have lost their respect for the old ways, and the Giants' Table is no longer a place of peaceful negotiation.

'Please seek out the Giants' Table and treat with the giants there if they still respect the old ways. Look for the Table south of the pass of Rakh창s-bizar, east of here. Do not enter the pass of Gabilazan, west of Rakh창s-bizar, for it is guarded by dwarves of an unpleasant disposition.'
Seek the Giants' Table in the Misty Mountains
The Giants' Table is south of the pass of Rakh창s-bizar, east of the guarded pass of Gabilazan.
